#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int t;
	long long int n;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	   {
	       cin>>n;
	       if(n%26==0)
	       {
	            n=n/26;
	       }
	       else
	        {
	          n=(n/26)+1;     
	        }
	    cout<<n<<"\n";    
	   }
	return 0;
}
